name: kolbo-desktop
description: Kolbo Studio - AI Creative Platform for Video Editors

scripts.start: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development node build-env.js && electron .
scripts.dev: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development node build-env.js && electron .
scripts.build:dev:win: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=development node build-env.js && electron-builder --win --config.productName="Kolbo Studio Dev"
scripts.build:dev:mac: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=development node build-env.js && electron-builder --mac --config.productName="Kolbo Studio Dev"
scripts.build:staging:win: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=staging node build-env.js && electron-builder --win --config.productName="Kolbo Studio Staging"
scripts.build:staging:mac: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=staging node build-env.js && electron-builder --mac --config.productName="Kolbo Studio Staging"
scripts.build:prod:win: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=production node build-env.js && node scripts/build-win.js
scripts.build:prod:mac: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=production node build-env.js && node scripts/build-mac.js
scripts.build:all:win: npm run build:dev:win && npm run build:staging:win && npm run build:prod:win
scripts.build:all:mac: npm run build:dev:mac && npm run build:staging:mac && npm run build:prod:mac
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m "Release v%s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m "Release v%s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m "Release v%s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:win: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=production node build-env.js && electron-builder --win --publish always
scripts.release:mac: cross-env KOLBO_ENV=production node build-env.js && electron-builder --mac --publish always

extendInfo.NSCameraUsageDescription: Kolbo Studio needs camera access for video recording and file uploads.
extendInfo.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Kolbo Studio needs microphone access for audio recording and file uploads.
